issue.title: Finish implementation of MkHook

repository.name: jcabi-github
repository.description: Java Object-Oriented Wrapper of GitHub API, with a fake implementation of the entire GitHub API (for your tests)

issue.body: `MkHook` does not implement all `Hook` interface methods; it throws an `UnsupportedOperationException` when the method `json() ` is called. Please implement this method accordingly and cover `MkHook` with tests.

issue.title: MkHook.java:48-49: Finish adding tests for MkHook#json()....

repository.name: jcabi-github
repository.description: Java Object-Oriented Wrapper of GitHub API, with a fake implementation of the entire GitHub API (for your tests)

issue.body:
The puzzle `1425-9f6b6bf1` from #1425 has to be resolved:

https://github.com/jcabi/jcabi-github/blob/5ce8049134676db4a7781f86eaf585bdb89556b0/src/main/java/com/jcabi/github/mock/MkHook.java#L48-L49

The puzzle was created by George Aristy on 18-Sep-18. 

Estimate: 30 minutes,     

If you have any technical questions, don't ask me, submit new tickets instead. The task will be "done" when the problem is fixed and the text of the puzzle is _removed_ from the source code. Here is more about [PDD](http://www.yegor256.com/2009/03/04/pdd.html) and [about me](http://www.yegor256.com/2017/04/05/pdd-in-action.html).

issue.title: (#1439) Tests for MkHook.json() and RtHook.json() "events"

repository.name: jcabi-github
repository.description: Java Object-Oriented Wrapper of GitHub API, with a fake implementation of the entire GitHub API (for your tests)

issue.body:
This PR is for #1439:
* Added tests checking "events" from `RtHook.json()` and `MkHook.json()`
* Left puzzle to fix `JsonNode` regarding the way it assumes everything in the XML is a JsonObject when some can be JsonArrays.

body: @0crat wait because I submitted PR #1441 for this
